gitCommit.subject: Add Claude Code configuration
gitCommit.body:
Add Claude Code configuration

Add custom slash command and permission settings for Claude Code:
- implement-feature command for frontend development workflow
- Local permission settings for git, npm, and GitHub CLI operations

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

gitCommit.subject: Add Claude Code configuration
gitCommit.body:
Add Claude Code configuration

Add custom slash command and permission settings for Claude Code:
- implement-feature command for frontend development workflow
- Local permission settings for git, npm, and GitHub CLI operations

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

specs.title: should display sunrise start time correctly (wake time - duration)
should calculate sunrise time correctly with 1 minute duration
should calculate sunrise time correctly with 60 minute duration
should not trigger alarm immediately when set for future
should show correct sunrise start time after changing duration
should show correct sunrise start time after changing wake time
should persist sunrise timing calculation after reload
should display both alarm time and sunrise time in next alarm info
should handle midnight crossing correctly
should recalculate timing when days of week change
should validate timing with browser console logs
should maintain accurate timing across multiple configuration changes
should calculate timing correctly for edge case durations
should show sign in link for unauthenticated users
should navigate to auth page when clicking sign in link
should navigate to auth page when clicking login button
should allow user to register a new account
should allow user to login with existing account
should show admin button for admin users
should persist auth state after page reload
should allow user to logout

specs.title: should sync alarm configuration to cloud for authenticated users
should access admin panel as admin user
should show user info for authenticated users
should show local storage message for unauthenticated users
should reject invalid credentials
should prevent duplicate registration
should load the app with default configuration
should update wake time
should update duration
should toggle day selection
should display next alarm information
should validate invalid wake time
should validate invalid duration
should show wake lock status indicator
should open power settings modal
should close power settings modal
should start alarm test mode
should stop alarm by clicking
should stop alarm with Escape key
should calculate next alarm correctly
should persist configuration across page reloads
